wikipedia_page.main: Alex T. Smith (born (1985-08-02)2 August 1985) is an English author and illustrator of children's books, including Primrose, Egg, Ella, and the Claude book series. He was the illustrator for World Book Day 2014 in September 2013.  His books have been published in several languages including Welsh, French, German, Swedish, Italian, Hungarian and Chinese.
